attributes.action: Should we have more London buses in rural areas
attributes.additional_details:
I live in rural part in Essex and it takes me an hour to get to school and an hour back.

If there was an incress it would cut down in congestion and more jobs will be created.

rejection.details: The provision of buses in Essex is a matter for the County Council; but if you are thinking of approaching them it might be helpful to clarify what you mean by 'more London buses'; while some London routes do extend into the Home Counties, it isn't for Transport for London to provide extra services outside the Greater London area.
